tool_bash: Top menu title: short phrase! or shortcut (to fit into the design) or leave untranslated
tool_sc: Top menu title: short phrase! or shortcut (to fit into the design) or leave untranslated
tool_rfa: Top menu title: short phrase! or shortcut (to fit into the design) or leave untranslated
tool_rfap: Top menu title: short phrase! or shortcut (to fit into the design) or leave untranslated

highreplag:
error if database replication is high. Parameters:
* $1 - duration. e.g. "6 minutes"
See also:
* {{msg-mw|Lag-warn-high}}
noresult: error: No matching results found for: $1 = search term
nograph:
message to opt-in. Parameters:
* $1 - page link
* $2 - page link
nograph2: message log in: $1 = OAuth help link
nowiki:
Parameters:
* $1 - the specified project name. But "wt::getUserInfo" appears currently.
executed:
message execution time.

Followed by {{msg-intuition|X'stools-memory}}.

Parameters:
* $1 - number of seconds. e.g. 1.6
memory:
message execution memory.

Preceded by {{msg-intuition|X'stools-executed}}.

Followed by "(Peak: NN.NN)".

Parameters:
* $1 - memory size (in megabytes). e.g. 13.75
searchresult:
header text for search result.
{{Identical|Search results}}
source:
link to source code repository on GitHub.
{{Identical|View source}}
all:
selection menu e.g. all namespaces in modul: Pages created
{{Identical|All}}
date:
Used as header for the column containing "time and date".
{{Identical|Date}}
bytes:
label for single character, plural, eg. text length = 3455 bytes
{{Identical|Byte}}
actions:
section header in modul: Page history: context user actions
{{Identical|Action}}
actions_admin: section header in modul: Page history: context actions made by administrators
select_language:
Used as label which is followed by GUI languages list.
{{Identical|Select language}}
login:
Used as link text for Login.
{{Identical|Log in}}
logout:
Used as link text for Logout.
{{Identical|Log out}}
time_ago:
e.g. last update: 30 minutes ago

Parameters:
* $1 - number
* $2 - unit (minutes, days) ago
{{Identical|Ago}}
past_time:
time period addition in braces. e.g. Statistics (past 365 days)

Parameters:
* $1 - number
* $2 - unit (days, minutes)
{{Identical|Past}}
approximate:
addition in braces, to indicate that these figures are inaccurate
{{Identical|Approximate}}
see_full_page_stats: label for a link to further details
see_full_edit_counts: label for a link to further details
userid:
registration id of a user (short term)
{{Identical|User ID}}
mainspace:
common name for main namespace in this wiki eg: (en)Article, (de) Artikel
{{Identical|Article}}
groups:
Used as label for User groups. e.g. user, autoconfirmed
{{Identical|User group}}
latestedit:
Latest edit of a user
{{Identical|Latest edit}}
numedits:
Number of edits a user has made.
{{Identical|Number of edits}}
average_per_page: Used as tooltip for the link text {{msg-intuition|X'stools-average per page sign}}.
average_per_page_sign:
message with Ø-sign, avarage edits per page.

Used as link text.

See also:
* {{msg-intuition|X'stools-average per page|tooltip}}
average_change_per_page:
Average change (in bytes) the user has made on a page.

Used as tooltip for the link text {{msg-intuition|X'stools-average change per page sign}}.
average_change_per_page_sign:
message with Ø-sign.

Average change (in bytes) the user has made on a page.

Used as link text.

See also:
* {{msg-intuition|X'stools-average change per page|tooltip}}
pages_created:
Pages a user has created.
{{Identical|Pages created}}
edits_summary: Edits with provided edit summary line
timecard: Chart that shows the edit behaviour
tagged:
in the context that something is marked, eg. a minor edit is tagged (m)
{{Identical|Tagged}}
no_summary: chart label for edits without summary, short phrase
with_summary: chart label for edits with summary, short phrase
thank:
Name of a MediaWiki log action, used as header of a row in the table of log action counts for a user.
{{Identical|Thank}}
approve:
Name of a MediaWiki log action, used as header of a row in the table of log action counts for a user
{{Identical|Approve}}
unapprove:
Name of a MediaWiki log action, used as header of a row in the table of log action counts for a user
{{Identical|Unapprove}}
patrol:
Name of a MediaWiki log action, used as header of a row in the table of log action counts for a user
{{Identical|Patrol}}
block:
Name of a MediaWiki log action, used as header of a row in the table of log action counts for a user.
{{Identical|Block}}
unblock:
Name of a MediaWiki log action, used as header of a row in the table of log action counts for a user
{{Identical|Unblock}}
protect:
Name of a MediaWiki log action, used as header of a row in the table of log action counts for a user.
{{Identical|Protect}}
unprotect:
Name of a MediaWiki log action, used as header of a row in the table of log action counts for a user.
{{Identical|Unprotect}}
delete:
Name of a MediaWiki log action, used as header of a row in the table of log action counts for a user.
{{Identical|Delete}}
restore:
Name of a MediaWiki log action, used as header of a row in the table of log action counts for a user
{{Identical|Restore}}
import:
Name of a MediaWiki log action, used as header of a row in the table of log action counts for a user
{{Identical|Import}}
topeditedpages: Top edited pages oof a user
autoedits: (semi-)automated edits with known tools like huggle
tosearch:
label for search text.

Also appears in header of the search result.
nofollowredir: Used as checkbox label in module Page history.
redirects:
wiki pages that redirect to other pages (short word).
{{Identical|Redirect}}
redirfilter_none:
form option in modul: Pages created.
{{Related|X'stools-redirfilter}}
redirfilter_onlyredirects:
form option in modul: Pages created.
{{Related|X'stools-redirfilter}}
redirfilter_noredirects:
form option in modul: Pages created.
{{Related|X'stools-redirfilter}}
article:
label for a wiki page in main namespace.
{{Identical|Article}}
generalstats: section header of section main figures
createdby:
Created by, aka the Creator.
{{Identical|Created by}}
timebwedits:
the average time between two edits.

Used as tooltip for {{msg-intuition|X'stools-avg timebwedits sign}}.
maxadd: Maximun text added by a user, short word or abbreviation for Max. (if possible)
maxdel: Maximum text deleted by a user, short word or abbreviation for Max. (if possible)
toptenbyedits: chart label for TOP 10 by edits
toptenbytext: chart label for TOP 10 by added text
editsperuser:
phrase as short as possible.

Used as tooltip for the link text {{msg-intuition|X'stools-avg edits per user sign}}.
avg_edits_per_user_sign:
label with Ø-sign, average number of edits per user.

Used as link text.

See also:
* {{msg-intuition|X'stools-editsperuser|tooltip}}
avg_edits_per_time_sign:
label with Ø-sign (means "average").

Parameters:
* $1 - unit (day, month, year), unit is always singular
editorcount:
Number of editors per page, phrase as short as possible.
{Identical|Number of editors}}
toptencount:
Number of edits made by the top 10% of active users

phrase as short as possible
ips:
label for non-logged in users, plural
{{Identical|IP}}
topten: chart label, as short as possible
bottomninety: chart label, as short as possible
atbe: Average time between edits by a single user
rc_usage_0: Usage message in modul: Range contribs
rc_usage_1:
Usage message in module: Range contribs.

Followed by the format "0.0.0.0/0" (hard-coded).
rc_usage_2: Usage message in modul: Range contribs
rc_usage_3: Usage message in modul: Range contribs
ip_number: number of calculated IPs in range
ip_found: number of IPs found in wiki logfiles
limit:
option to specify a limit of results.
{{Identical|Limit}}
resultbyname: label for results by name or IP
unknown:
neither support nor oppose nor neutral.
{{Identical|Unknown}}
vote_msg:
Parameters:
* $1 - username
* $2 - number of vote pages
* $3 - name of vote page. e.g. "Requests for adminship"
rfx_intro: This sentence is followed by a list of configured sites
rfx_bureaucrat: further intro message in modul: RfX
